nodes.text: Obi-Wan's Bongo Adventure was a children's storybook published by Scholastic in November 1999 as part of the Star Wars Junior book series. The story details Obi-Wan's journey through the planet core of Naboo.
Obi-Wan Kenobi is a Jedi. He and his Jedi Master have landed on the planet Naboo. Obi-Wan Kenobi is brave and strong. He is also lost. Can the strange and silly Jar Jar help him?
